member.name: M:API.Authorization.Controllers.ConsentController.GetConsent
member.summary: Retrieves consents granted and received by the organization that a user is affiliated with. It will read the IdpUserId and OrgCvr claims from the users session token, use those to query the database, and return a list of consents.

member.name: M:API.Authorization.Controllers.ConsentController.GetReceivedConsent
member.summary: Retrieves consents received by the organization that a user is affiliated with.

member.name: M:API.Authorization.Controllers.ConsentController.DeleteConsent(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a consent, from the organization, which the user is affiliated with.
member.param: The ID of the consent to delete.
member.returns: No content if the deletion was successful, Not Found if the consent was not found.
